txt.en:
'Hoom, hum. What are you, little one? Do not tell me, hasty creature. I will find out.

  dwarf ... the delver... but not just any delver... much pain to which you have been witness...

'Hm, yes, that is you. Will you accept the gift of your peoples?'

<rgb=#FF0000>By completing this quest, you will receive racial traits for a high level character.</rgb>
'Room tum, room tum, roomty toom tum.'
Talk to Snowlight to receive your Racial Traits
By completing this quest, you will receive racial traits for a high level character.
